    • Method Detail

      • add_node_to_trusted_hosts

        @Given(value="^add node (.+) to trusted hosts$")
public void add_node_to_trusted_hosts(java.lang.String node)
        Adds a remote hostname or fqdn to the trusted host table
        Parameters:
        node - String, node name from winrm configuration of the remote that shall be added

      • check_that_DNS_entry_for_remote_host_was_updated

        @Then(value="^check that DNS entry for remote host (.+) was updated$")
public void check_that_DNS_entry_for_remote_host_was_updated(java.lang.String node)
        periodically checks if DNS entry was updated and ip address of new vm can be resolved to its hostname checks are done every minute with timeout 55 minutes
        Parameters:
        node - String, node name from winrm configuration of the remote that shall be used

      • remote_host_is_accessible

        @Given(value="^remote host (.+) is accessible$")
public void remote_host_is_accessible(java.lang.String node)
        checks if remote host is accessible and winrm connection using winrs client can be established
        Parameters:
        node - String, node name from winrm configuration of the remote that shall be used

      • remote_host_set_new_MS_SQL_password_for_user_sa

        @When(value="^on remote host (.+) set new MS SQL password (.+) for user sa$")
public void remote_host_set_new_MS_SQL_password_for_user_sa(java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String password)
        Sets new password for Ms Sql instance on newly created vm
        Parameters:
        node - String, node name from winrm configuration of the remote that shall be used
        password - String, new ms sql password
